item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

That code… That code is just terrible… You need to rethink how your system works big time.

The createGroundItem method shouldn’t be in charge of checking what items can/can’t be dropped. At least the way you currently have it setup. I’m sure there’s other methods that call the createGroundItem method that you should be doing the checks in…
Ex: applyDead and giveLife.
Or if you were preventing players from right clicking the item and dropping it, it’d be in the dropitem packet.
